amendment.description: Amendment sought to modify the temporary suspension of public-private competitions for conversion of Department of Defense functions to contractor performance and permit the Secretary of Defense to exempt existing public-private partnerships from the OMB Budget Circular A-76 process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to modify the temporary suspension of public-private competitions for conversion of Department of Defense functions to contractor performance and permit the Secretary of Defense to exempt existing public-private partnerships from the OMB Budget Circular A-76 process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rigell amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 248 (Roll no. 225).
